Name: Block Statue of Djedkhonsuiuefankh
Description: This statue of Djedkhonsuiuefankh, the Fourth Priest of Amun, shows him seated on a rectangular base and completely covered with a wide garment. He wears a broad, flat wig that leaves his ears exposed. His elbow and hand are modeled in low relief, and the curves of his body were carved in an unusual way. Four hieroglyphic lines on the front of the statue contain Djedkhonsuiuefankh's name and titles.
